title: Carlyle Signs New Advisory Deal With Fortitude Re
sub_head: Agreement with reinsurer will boost Carlyle’s fee-paying assets under management by $50 billion
body:
Carlyle Group Inc. has struck a sweeping new advisory agreement with reinsurer Fortitude Re that is set to significantly boost the private-equity firm’s assets under management.
Carlyle will earn a recurring fee based on all of Fortitude Re’s assets for assisting the reinsurer with acquisitions and identifying new growth opportunities, the firms plan to announce Thursday.
